articles.content: Nintendo Switch 2 has a strong set of first-year titles: Mario Kart World, Kirby Air Riders, and Donkey Kong Bananza are all confirmed to launch sometime this year (plus Nintendo Switch 2 Editions fo… [+7396 chars]

articles.title: Xbox Giving Away AAA Game for Free for 72 Hours Only - ComicBook.com
articles.description: The Microsoft Store has a free AAA Xbox game available to all Xbox One, Xbox Series S, and Xbox Series X users for the next 72 hours.
articles.content: The Microsoft Store has a free AAA Xbox game for Xbox One, Xbox Series S, and Xbox Series X users, however, the offer is only available for the next 72 hours or, more precisely, until May 27. Once re… [+2591 chars]

articles.title: This is Miyamoto. And it’s Nintendo’s world. - The Washington Post
articles.description: With a third Super Nintendo World open at Epic Universe, the legendary creator of Mario, Zelda and Donkey Kong has made his playful dreams into a global empire.
articles.content:
